rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
一流的单克隆抗体有望治疗罕见的侵袭性高炎症性疾病新诊断的恶性肿瘤相关噬血细胞性淋巴组织细胞增多症 (mHLH) 是一种罕见的侵袭性高炎症性疾病，接受一流单克隆抗体 ELA026 治疗的成年患者的缓解率为 100%，并且两个月后的生存率有所提高德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员表示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/First-in-class-monoclonal-antibody-shows-promise-for-rare-aggressive-hyperlingual-condition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/First-in-class-monoclonal-antibody-shows-promise-for-rare-aggressive-hyperlingual-condition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d413eae-29ea-4d3b-b13e-b60796634438 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 23:22:08 -0500 First-in-class monoclonal antibody shows promise for rare, aggressive hyperinflammatory condition
研究发现饮食模式影响地中海饮食的坚持葡萄牙研究人员探索了橄榄油的消费和对地中海饮食的坚持，揭示了主要障碍和消费模式。研究结果强调需要制定量身定制的策略来促进这种促进健康的生活方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Research-uncovers-dietary-patterns-influencing-Mediterranean-Diet-adherence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Research-uncovers-dietary-patterns-influencing-Mediterranean-Diet-adherence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eceec545-a923-4d9e-9656-8fbfdb63f0a7 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 23:00:00 -0500 Research uncovers dietary patterns influencing Mediterranean Diet adherence
生活方式和健康如何影响您患痴呆症的风险兰德公司的新研究利用具有全国代表性的美国数据集确定了认知障碍和痴呆症的早期预测因素，强调了可改变因素和基线认知健康在预防和干预策略中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/How-lifestyle-and-health-shape-your-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/How-lifestyle-and-health-shape-your-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d11d0d04-9db3-4d81-8b13-66d40a7f32e4 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 22:42:00 -0500 How lifestyle and health shape your dementia risk
UVM科学家发现大脑血流调节的新机制由佛蒙特大学拉纳医学院的 Mark Nelson 博士领导的 UVM 科学家团队发现了一种新的机制，它重塑了我们对大脑血流如何调节的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/UVM-scientists-discover-new-mechanism-for-blood-flow-regulation-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/UVM-scientists-discover-new-mechanism-for-blood-flow-regulation-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8f87a1d-f86c-4c64-8a45-78ce3a171694 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 21:11:54 -0500 UVM scientists discover new mechanism for blood flow regulation in the brain
斯克里普斯研究公司开发了用于实时视频分析的受大脑启发的人工智能想象一个人工智能 (AI) 模型，它可以像人脑一样观察和理解运动图像。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Scripps-Research-develops-brain-inspired-AI-for-real-time-video-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Scripps-Research-develops-brain-inspired-AI-for-real-time-video-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=320935f7-6d5b-4209-91c5-c4eea4011793 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 21:07:51 -0500 Scripps Research develops brain-inspired AI for real-time video analysis
科学家发现驱动肿瘤形成和扩散的遗传密码弗吉尼亚联邦大学梅西综合癌症中心的一组科学家揭示了一种新的遗传密码，它的作用就像癌症头目一样，招募和部署一群肿瘤细胞，通过入侵健康器官并压倒正常细胞来煽动生物地盘战争。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Scientists-uncover-genic-code-driven-tumor-formation-and-spread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Scientists-uncover-genic-code-driven-tumor-formation-and-spread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=196e115d-9aef-4c98-99d8-b22ac0bb9b1e Mon, 09 Dec 2024 20:58:18 -0500 Scientists uncover genetic code driving tumor formation and spread
新进展为系统性肥大细胞增多症患者带来希望丹纳—法伯癌症研究所的研究人员在对抗系统性肥大细胞增多症方面取得了新的进展，这是一种罕见的异质性疾病，临床医生准确诊断和治疗往往面临挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/New-advances-offer-hope-for-病人-with-systemic-mastocytosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/New-advances-offer-hope-for-病人-with-systemic-mastocytosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04472884-86e9-46ab-9f46-d641737b84e6 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 20:53:24 -0500 New advances offer hope for patients with systemic mastocytosis
研究人员确定了 2 型糖尿病心脏病背后的关键机制2 型糖尿病患者患心血管疾病和因动脉粥样硬化而过早死亡的风险较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Researchers-identify-key-mechanisms-behind-heart-disease-in-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Researchers-identify-key-mechanisms-behind-heart-disease-in-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86d59a78-4202-4e08-8bed-c2e56023eaf1 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 20:30:39 -0500 Researchers identify key mechanisms behind heart disease in type 2 diabetes
研究提供了乳腺癌转移遗传倾向的第一个证据百分之九十的癌症死亡是由于癌症扩散，而不是原发肿瘤的并发症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Study-provides-the-first-evidence-of-genic-predisposition-to-breast-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Study-provides-the-first-evidence-of-genic-predisposition-to-breast-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0df8fb4-dbf7-4bbe-953d-a918d9b3dc94 Mon, 09 Dec 2024 20:25:35 -0500 Study provides the first evidence of genetic predisposition to breast cancer metastasis
新型葡萄糖敏感膜为糖尿病患者提供改善的胰岛素调节多年来，葡萄糖敏感膜一直是改善糖尿病治疗中受控胰岛素释放的关键焦点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Novel-glucose-sensitive-membrane-offers-improved-insulin-regulation-for-diabetic-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241209/Novel-glucose-sensitive-membrane-offers-improved-insulin-regulation-for-diabetic-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b48c4b47-2a32-4d9e-98c0-b041624b1b7e Mon, 09 Dec 2024 20:21:12 -0500 Novel glucose-sensitive membrane offers improved insulin regulation for diabetic patients
